trans-unit.source: Add Roman Croatian and Romanian encodings, codecs for mac-extended East Asian encodings
trans-unit.target: 增加罗马语克罗地亚语和罗马尼亚语编码,Mac扩展的东亚编码的编解码器。

trans-unit.source: Add Snippet scripts for cmap subtable format conversion, printing GSUB/GPOS features, building a GX font from two masters
trans-unit.target: 添加Snippet脚本,用于cmap子表格式转换、打印GSUB/GPOS功能、从两个母版建立GX字体。

trans-unit.source: Add pyftsubset and Subsetter object, supporting CFF and TTF
Add support for Google CBLC/CBDT color bitmaps, standard EBLC/EBDT embedded bitmaps, and
trans-unit.target: 增加对谷歌CBLC/CBDT彩色位图、标准EBLC/EBDT嵌入式位图的支持。

trans-unit.source: Add support for Microsoft COLR/CPAL layered color glyphs
trans-unit.target: 增加对微软COLR/CPAL分层颜色字形的支持。

trans-unit.source: Add support for loading, saving and ttx’ing WOFF file format
trans-unit.target: 添加对加载，保存和处理WOFF文件格式的支持

trans-unit.source: Add to ttx args for -q for quiet mode, -z to choose a bitmap dump format
trans-unit.target: 添加到ttx args中,-q表示安静模式,-z表示选择位图转储格式。

trans-unit.source: Add varLib.models with Variation fonts interpolation models
Added -b option to ttCompile.py, it disables recalculation of bounding boxes, as requested by Werner Lemberg.
trans-unit.target: 在 ttCompile.py 中添加了 -b 选项,按照 Werner Lemberg 的要求,它禁用了边界框的重新计算。

trans-unit.source: Added -d option to both ttDump.py and ttCompile.py.
trans-unit.target: 为 ttDump.py 和 ttCompile.py 添加了 -d 选项。

trans-unit.source: Added OpenType support. BASE, GDEF, GPOS, GSUB and JSTF are (almost) fully supported. The XML output is not yet final, as I’m still considering to output certain subtables in a more human-friendly manner.
trans-unit.target: 添加了OpenType支持。几乎完全支持BASE，GDEF，GPOS，GSUB和JSTF。XML输出尚未最终完成，因为我仍在考虑以更人性化的方式输出某些子表。

trans-unit.source: Added experimental CFF/GPOS/GSUB support to ttLib, read-only (but XML dumping of GPOS/GSUB is for now disabled)
trans-unit.target: 在ttLib中添加了实验性的CFF/GPOS/GSUB支持,只读(但GPOS/GSUB的XML转储暂时被禁用)。

trans-unit.source: Added proper support for the CFF table.
trans-unit.target: 增加了对CFF表的适当支持。

trans-unit.source: Added several submodules to fontTools, some new, some older.
trans-unit.target: 为fontTools添加了几个子模块,有些是新的,有些是旧的。

trans-unit.source: Added some workarounds so as to handle certain buggy fonts more gracefully.
trans-unit.target: 增加了一些变通方法,以便更优雅地处理某些错误字体。

trans-unit.source: Added support for Graphite font tables: Feat, Glat, Gloc, Silf and Sill. Thanks @mhosken! (#1054).
trans-unit.target: 增加了对 Graphite 字体表的支持。Feat,Glat,Gloc,Silf 和 Sill。感谢 @mhosken!(#1054)。(#1054).

trans-unit.target: fpgm、prep和glyf表中的汇编代码现在在XML输出中缩进了,以提高可读性。列表中的

trans-unit.source: Be “forgiving” when interpreting the maxp table version field: interpret any value as 1.0 if it’s not 0.5. Fixes dumping of these GPL fonts: http://www.freebsd.org/cgi/pds.cgi?ports/chinese/wangttf
trans-unit.target: 解释maxp表版本字段时要“原谅”：将任何值解释为1.0（如果不是0.5）。修复了以下GPL字体的转储：http ://www.freebsd.org/cgi/pds.cgi?ports/chinese/ wangttf
大重组：ttLib成为新fontTools包的子包，更改了几个模块名称。整个套件称为“ FontTools”

trans-unit.source: Changed the command line interface again, now by creating one new tool replacing the old ones: ttx It dumps and compiles, depending on input file types. The options have changed somewhat.
trans-unit.target: 再次更改了命令行界面,现在通过创建一个新的工具来代替旧的工具:ttx 它根据输入文件类型,进行转储和编译。选项有了一些变化。

trans-unit.source: Couple of fixes to the ‘post’ table.

Distutils argument. This means that we no longer create a “FontTools” subfolder in site-packages containing the actual fontTools package, as well as the standalone xmlWriter and sstruct modules. The latter modules are also deprecated, and scheduled for removal in upcoming releases. Please change your import statements to point to from fontTools.misc import xmlWriter and from fontTools.misc import sstruct.
trans-unit.target: Distutils参数。这意味着我们不再在包含实际fontTools软件包以及独立xmlWriter和sstruct模块的站点软件包中创建“ FontTools”子文件夹。后者的模块也已弃用，并计划在即将发布的版本中删除。请更改导入语句，使其指向从fontTools.misc import xmlWriter和从fontTools.misc import sstruct。

trans-unit.source: Don’t barf on empty tables (questionable, but “there are font out there…”)
trans-unit.target: 不要在空表上乱扔（有疑问，但是“那里有字体……”）

trans-unit.source: Dump glyph names as a separate “GlyphOrder” pseudo table as opposed to as part of the glyf table (obviously needed for CFF-OTF’s).
trans-unit.target: 将字形名称作为单独的“ GlyphOrder”伪表转储，而不是作为字形表的一部分转储（对于CFF-OTF显然是必需的）。

trans-unit.source: Fix compiling of MultipleSubstFormat1 with zero ‘out’ glyphs (b887860).
trans-unit.target: 使用零个“输出”字形来修复MultipleSubstFormat1的编译（b887860）。

trans-unit.source: Fix issue with Apple’s kern table format
trans-unit.target: 修复Apple精简表格式的问题

trans-unit.source: Fix mangling of TT glyph programs
Fixed “DeprecationWarning: invalid escape sequence” in Python 3.7.
trans-unit.target: 修复了Python 3.7中的“ DeprecationWarning：无效的转义序列”。

trans-unit.source: Fixed ‘kern’ table to correctly accept subtables it doesn’t know about, as well as interpreting Apple’s definition of the ‘kern’ table headers correctly.
trans-unit.target: 修复了“ kern”表以正确接受它不知道的子表，以及正确解释了Apple对“ kern”表头的定义的问题。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug in ClassDef format 1 subtable (Andreas Seidel bumped into this one).
trans-unit.target: 修正了ClassDef格式1子表中的bug(Andreas Seidel撞上了这个)。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug in hmtx/vmtx code that only occured if all advances were equal.
trans-unit.target: 修正了 hmtx/vmtx 代码中的错误,该错误只有在所有预付款相等时才会发生。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug where glyphnames were not calculated from ‘cmap’ if it was (one of the) first tables to be decompiled. More specifically: it cmap was the first to ask for a glyphID -> glyphName mapping.
trans-unit.target: 修复了以下错误：如果字形名称是要反编译的（其中之一）第一张表，则不会从“ cmap”中计算出字形。更具体地说：它的cmap是第一个要求glyphID-> glyphName映射的对象。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bugs: - ‘hhea’ table is now recalculated correctly - fixed wrong assumption about sfnt resource names
trans-unit.target: 修复了错误：-现在正确重新计算了'hhea'表-修复了关于sfnt资源名称的错误假设

trans-unit.source: Fixed embarrassing bug: the master checksum in the head table is now calculated correctly even on little-endian platforms (such as Intel).
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个尴尬的bug:即使在小二烯平台(如英特尔)上,现在也能正确计算头表中的主校验和。
修正了 hdmx endian 的错误

trans-unit.source: Fixed inconsistent title levels in README.rst that caused PyPI to incorrectly render the reStructuredText page.
trans-unit.target: 修正了 README.rst 中不一致的标题级别,导致 PyPI 错误地渲染 reStructuredText 页面。

trans-unit.source: Fixed subtle bug in TT instruction disassembler.
trans-unit.target: 修正了TT指令反汇编器中的细微错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed ttx -l: it turned out this part of the code didn’t work with Python 2.2.1 and earlier. My bad to do most of my testing with a different version than I shipped TTX with :-(
trans-unit.target: 修复了ttx -l：原来这部分代码不适用于Python 2.2.1和更早版本。我的大多数测试都使用与TTX附带的版本不同的其他版本进行:-(

trans-unit.source: Font tables read from XML can now be written back to XML with no loss.
trans-unit.target: 从XML中读取的字体表现在可以无损地写回XML。

trans-unit.source: FontTools 4.x requires Python 3.6 or later. FontTools 3.x requires Python 2.7 or later.
trans-unit.target: FontTools 4.x需要Python 3.6或更高版本。FontTools 3.x需要Python 2.7或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: GSUB/GPOS LookupType is written out in XML as an element, not comment. (#792)
trans-unit.target: GSUB/GPOS LookupType在XML中是作为一个元素写出来的,而不是注释。(#792)

trans-unit.source: If you would like to contribute to its development, you can clone the repository from GitHub, install the package in ‘editable’ mode and modify the source code in place. We recommend creating a virtual environment, using virtualenv or Python 3 venv module.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想为它的开发做出贡献，可以从GitHub克隆存储库，以“可编辑”模式安装该软件包，并就地修改源代码。我们建议使用virtualenv或Python 3 venv模块创建虚拟环境。

trans-unit.source: Renamed the command line programs and moved them to the Tools subdirectory. They are now installed by the setup.py install script.
trans-unit.target: 重新命名了命令行程序,并将它们移到了工具子目录下。现在它们已经由setup.py安装脚本安装。

trans-unit.source: Renamed tt2xml.pt to ttDump.py and xml2tt.py to ttCompile.py
Reorganized the command line interface for ttDump.py and ttCompile.py, they now behave more like “normal” command line tool, in that they accept multiple input files for batch processing.
trans-unit.target: 重新组织了ttDump.py和ttCompile.py的命令行界面，它们现在的行为更像“普通”命令行工具，因为它们接受多个输入文件以进行批处理。

trans-unit.source: Require typing>=3.6.4 on py27 to fix issue with singledispatch (#1423).
trans-unit.target: 要求在py27上键入> = 3.6.4，以解决singledispatch（＃1423）的问题。

trans-unit.source: See LICENSE for the full license.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整许可证，请参阅LICENSE。

trans-unit.source: Support Jython, by replacing numpy with array/lists modules and removed it, pure-Python StringIO, not cStringIO
trans-unit.target: 支持Jython,通过将numpy替换为array/list模块并将其删除,纯python的StringIO,而不是cStringIO。

trans-unit.source: Switched XML parsers: use expat instead of xmlproc. Should be faster.
trans-unit.target: 更改了 XML 解析器:使用 expat 而不是 xmlproc。应该会更快。

trans-unit.source: TTX is now the name of the XML-based format for TT fonts, and not just an application.
trans-unit.target: TTX现在是TT字体的基于XML的格式的名称，而不仅仅是一个应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The -s option (“split tables”) no longer creates a directory, but instead outputs a small .ttx file containing references to the individual table files. This is not a true link, it’s a simple file name, and the referenced file should be in the same directory so ttcompile can find them.
trans-unit.target: -s选项（“拆分表”）不再创建目录，而是输出一个小的.ttx文件，其中包含对各个表文件的引用。这不是一个真正的链接，它是一个简单的文件名，并且引用的文件应位于同一目录中，以便ttcompile可以找到它们。

trans-unit.source: The XML output for CFF table now has a ‘major’ and ‘minor’ elements for specifying whether it’s version 1.0 or 2.0 (support for CFF2 is coming soon)
trans-unit.target: CFF表的XML输出现在具有一个“主要”和“次要”元素，用于指定它是1.0版还是2.0版（即将提供对CFF2的支持）

trans-unit.target: 该模块导出了一个类似于ElementTree的API,用于读取/写入XML文件,并允许使用内置的XML文件作为后端。

trans-unit.source: [AAT] Added support for AAT lookups. The

[API change] Change version to be an integer instead of a float in XML output for GSUB, GPOS, GDEF, MATH, BASE, JSTF, HVAR, VVAR, feat, hhea and vhea tables. Scripts that set the Version for those to 1.0 or other float values also need fixing. A warning is emitted when code or XML needs fix.

CFF2 Subr items can have values on the stack after the last operator, thus a

trans-unit.source: [ufoLib] When converting kerning groups from UFO2 to UFO3, avoid confusing groups with the same name as one of the glyphs (#1761, #1762, unified-font-object/ufo-spec#98).
trans-unit.target: [ufoLib]将字距调整组从UFO2转换为UFO3时，请避免混淆与字形之一相同名称的组（＃1761，＃1762，unified-font-object / ufo-spec＃98）。

[varLib.featureVar] Improve FeatureVariations generation with many rules.

trans-unit.source: [varLib.merger] Fixed IndexError with empty ClassDef1 in PairPosFormat2 (aad0d46).
